greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (floor((n+1)*Pi) - floor(n*Pi)) mod 2.
comment: The arithmetic mean (1/(n+1))*Sum_{k=0..n} a(k) converges to 4 - Pi. What is effectively the same: the Cesaro limit (C1) of a(n) is 4 - Pi.
results.author: _Hieronymus Fischer_, Jan 31 2006
